text: Albert Hill may refer to: * Albert E. Hill (1870–1933), American pro-labor politician * Albert Edwin Hill (Bertie Hill, 1927–2005), (1926–2005), British equestrian, gold medallist at the 1956 Summer Olympics * Albert G. Hill (1910–1996), American physicist * Albert Ross Hill (1868–1943), Canadian-born American educator * Albert Hill (athlete) (1889–1969), British athlete, winner of two gold medals at the 1920 Summer Olympics * Albert Hill (VC) (1895–1971), British Victoria Cross recipient * Albert Hill (American football) (active 1896–1969), American college football quarterback ==See also== * Al Hill (disambiguation) * Hill (surname)
title: Albert Hill
